definitions.definition: To cook in a small amount of liquid, in a covered pan , somewhere between steaming and boiling .
Alternative spelling of braze ( joining non-ferrous metal using a molten filler metal )

main_definition: ( cooking ) To cook in a small amount of liquid, in a covered pan , somewhere between steaming and boiling .
secondary_definitions: Alternative spelling of braze ( joining non-ferrous metal using a molten filler metal )
